stockinette stitch gauge before felting 4 5 mm us 7 40 cm circular and dpns or long circular for needle magic loop for base if needed body with the darker color cast on 72 sts on 4 5 mm 40 cm circular needles with longtail cast-on jogless join join in the round and work 9 rounds in stockinette in the round change to the lighter color work 3 rnds next round place markers for pocket position knit 15 sts pm purl 20 sts pm knit to end now work in pattern while changing colors to make stripes of 10 row at the 10th round of your second lighter color stripe you stop purling for the pocket knit to end and remove markers change to the darker color and knit 1 round now youʼll start making the base of the bag base with dark color purl 1 round to create a ridge stripy felted mini bag 1 on next round place markers evenly spaced k18 pm k18 pm k18 pm k18 total 72 sts begin decrease rnds as follows decrease round *k1 k2tog knit to 3sts before marker ssk k1* repeat from *to * around 8 sts decreased work decrease rnds and plain knit rnds as follows changing color halfway if desired decrease just knit rnd1 rnd2 rnd3 rnd4 rnd5 rnd6 rnd7 rnd8 rnd9 rnd10 change color rnd1 rnd2 rnd3 rnd4 rnd5 rnd6 rnd7 rnd8 rnd9 rnd10 stripy felted mini bag 2 you have 16 sts on your needle change color k2tog to end break yarn and draw through 8 remaining sts pulling up tightly optional highly recommend you add i-cord edge at the top of your bag to give more structure i-cord edge pocket with the lighter color pick up 20 sts under the pocket placeholder which appears in reversed stockinette stitch on 4 5 mm 6080cm needles work 30 row total including pick-up and bind-off row alternate colors every 10 row for stripes rs knit ws purl optional for a neat edge work the final stripe in seed stitch and try ruke bind-off method seed stich with mattress stitch attach the pocket sides to the body of the ruke bind- bag off mattress handle stitch youʼll make the same handle twice work both handles simultaneously if desired cast on 7 sts on 4 5 mm 6080cm needles with longtail cast- on make 2 at a work in seed stitch for approximately 80 row about 36 cm / time 14 in rs/ws *k1 p1* repeat * to * to end fold the center 34 cm of the handle in half and sew it with the same wool yarn stripy felted mini bag 3 felting and finishing wash bag and handles in a washing machine until they
